# Governance Endpoints

Tags, classifications, and catalog search.

## `GET /classifications`

List classification and sensitivity tags

Returns all tags with governed classification/sensitivity prefixes.

- Operation ID: `listClassifications`

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Classification tags |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /search`

Search catalog objects

Full-text search across schemas, tables, columns, and macros.

- Operation ID: `searchCatalog`

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `catalog` | `string` | `false` | Scope search to a specific catalog (defaults to the default catalog). |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |
| `query` | `string` | `true` | Search query string to match against catalog objects. |
| `type` | `string` | `false` | Filter by object type: schema, table, column, or macro |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Search results |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `DELETE /tag-assignments/{assignmentId}`

Remove a tag assignment

Removes a tag assignment, unlinking the tag from the securable object.

- Operation ID: `deleteTagAssignment`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `assignmentId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the assignment. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `204` | Tag unassigned |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /tags`

List all tags

Returns a paginated list of all tags defined in the catalog.

- Operation ID: `listTags`

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Paginated list of tags |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /tags`

Create a tag

Creates a new tag for classifying and annotating catalog objects.

- Operation ID: `createTag`

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `201` | Created tag |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `409` | The resource already exists or conflicts with current state. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `DELETE /tags/{tagId}`

Delete a tag

Permanently deletes a tag and all of its assignments from the catalog.

- Operation ID: `deleteTag`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `tagId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the tag. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `204` | Tag deleted |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /tags/{tagId}/assignments`

Assign a tag to a securable object

Creates an assignment linking a tag to a specific securable catalog object.

- Operation ID: `createTagAssignment`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `tagId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the tag. |

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `201` | Tag assigned |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `409` | The resource already exists or conflicts with current state. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |
